titleStmt.title: The copy of a letter from Min Heer T.V.L. to Min Heer H.V.C. Faithfully translated from the original.
titleStmt.author: T. V. L.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Dated on p. 2: Amsterdam March the 15th. 1689.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (university of Oxford). Library.
